quotes.quote: Beauty isn't between a size zero and a size eight, it is not a number at all. It is not physical.
There is zero, and there is eternity, and there is mortality, but there is no ultimate.
There is zero correlation between IQ and emotional empathy.They're controlled by different parts of the brain.
Zero-zero is a big score.
Zero invites imagination, but small numbers invite questions about whether large numbers will ever materialize.
Zero defects is a super highway going down the tube.
Zero is supposed to be nothing, but works wonders if on the right side.
Black holes are where God divided by zero.
Zero ground is the beginning. sometimes you just don't have the normal productivity day.
We all start with zero. We all start at the beginning. Do not give up.
There is no such thing as zero uncertainty.
At the point so near to zero, just almost before the death, life's value jumps to infinity!
If you want creativity, take a zero off your budget. If you want sustainability, take off two zeros.
When one's expectations are reduced to zero, one really appreciates everything one does have.
There's zero correlation between being the best talker and having the best ideas.
It means zero to be against greed.
Starting from ZERO get nothing to lose.
Infinity is just zero spelled backwards.
Zero is the number people often feel, more so than one.
A good teacher who can take the zero pay and help kids develop physically, emotionally, socially, is literally an angel.
A zero itself is nothing, but without a zero you cannot count anything; therefore, a zero is something, yet zero.
Zeroth law: You must play the game First law: You can't win Second law: You can't break even Third law: You can't quit the game.
You are at the top. We just start from zero.
We act like a zero-sum society, when in reality there is a lot of non zero-sum fat to be skimmed off to everyone's mutual advantage.
If your position is everywhere, your momentum is zero.
The real minimum wage is zero.
Zero is the desire. When it gets existence, it creates one. And there is always another one and that is chaos.
When you make yourself into zero, your power becomes invincible.
A zero-gravity flight is a first step toward space travel.
If you don't have a goal, you will score zero even if you run with the fastest speed.
